definition[0]: a process in which a special relationship develops between two or more people
example[0]: the bonding between mare and foal
definition[1]: the connection of atoms or of two surfaces that are glued together
definition[2]: the practice of keeping goods that have been imported in a special building and officially promising to pay the import tax when it is due
example[2]: a $100 auction-licensing fee and $80 a month to cover bonding
